original: Carlander, Per Johannes, godsägare, rådman, Mariestad, f. 3/4/82 i Gbg av grosshandl. Christopher C. o. Isabella Bourn. G. 06 m. Viva Ellen Louise Södergren. Barn: Lisa f. 06, g. Carlander, Karin 08, g. 30 m. civ:-ing. Claes Fischerström, Greta 08, g. 30 m. disp. Gösta Blum, Christofer 12, forstmäst., g. 38 m. Margareta Danielsson, Per-Olof 16, lantbr., g. 41 m. Karin Synnergren. — Godsäg. å Fal-kenå egend. i Närke 05-09, å Säby i Skarab. 1. 09-27, å Ramisnäs sed. 29. Rådman i Mariestad sed. 29. Verkst. dir. v. Johannesbergs anst. sed. 20. Ordf. f. Skarab. 1. jordbr :komm. 28-45, led. aiv hush :sä!l’lsk. förvsdltni :u!t;sk. 16-26, ordf. i komm:fulilm. i Haissle-Enås-Berga 20-27. RNO, RVO, Hush:-sällsk. GM, SvRKSM.
translated: Carlander, Per Johannes, landlord, councilman, Mariestad, born on April 3, 1882 in Gothenburg, son of the merchant Christopher C. and Isabella Bourn. Married in 1906 to Viva Ellen Louise Södergren. Children: Lisa, born in 1906, married a Carlander, Karin, born in 1908, married in 1930 to civil engineer Claes Fischerström, Greta, born in 1908, married in 1930 to Gösta Blum, Christopher, born in 1912, forest manager, married in 1938 to Margareta Danielsson, Per-Olof, born in 1916, farmer, married in 1941 to Karin Synnergren. Owned Fal-kenå estate in Närke from 1905-1909, Säby estate in Skaraborg county from 1909-1927, and Ramisnäs estate from 1929. Councilman in Mariestad from 1929. Managed the Johannesbergs institution from 1920. Chairman of the Skaraborg agricultural committee from 1928-1945, member of the household society committee from 1916-1926, chairman of the municipal committee in Haissle-Enås-Berga from 1920-1927. Received awards: RNO, RVO, Hushållningssällskapet GM, SvRKSM.

structured.name: Per Johannes Carlander
jobTitle: Chairman of Municipal Committee in Haissle-Enås-Berga
